name: auth-org-switcher
description: Organization and workspace switcher dropdown with search, avatars, and create new org option
postMessage:
Org Switcher installed!

Usage:
import { OrgSwitcher } from '@/components/auth-org-switcher/org-switcher'

<OrgSwitcher
  organizations={orgs}
  currentOrgId="org_123"
  onOrgChange={(orgId) => { /* switch context */ }}
/>

Requires shadcn/ui: npx shadcn@latest add button popover command avatar
